name: ncrafts-wall
description: Tweet wall for Ncrafts conf, using Tweetping stream (https://www.tweetping.net)

scripts.prod: npm run prod-css & npm run prod-js
scripts.dev: npm run dev-js & npm run dev-css
scripts.dev-js: watchify --verbose --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/main.js -- app/js/index.jsx | exorcist public/main.js.map > public/main.js
scripts.prod-js: browserify app/js/index.jsx --verbose -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ]  ] | uglifyjs -c=dead_code,evaluate,loops,unused > public/main.js

author: Jérôme Avoustin <jerome@rehia.fr>
